quotes.quote: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
Consciousness was upon him before he could get out of the way.
Consciousness itself is an infinite regress. This explains coincidences.
The only way to give finality to the world is to give it consciousness.
Consciousness is the stone that creates the waves in a sea of nothing.

Through consciousness, our minds have the power to change our planet and ourselves. It is time we heed the wisdom of the ancient indigenous people and channel our consciousness and spirit to tend the garden and not destroy it.
Analysis brings no curative powers in its train; it merely makes us conscious of the existence of an evil, which, oddly enough, is consciousness.
Consciousness is the greatest movie-maker in the whole world.
Consciousness is not mind; it is the ground of all being, the ground of both matter and mind. Matter and mind are both possibilities of consciousness.
The real history of consciousness starts with one's first lie.
Consciousness is only possible through change; change is only possible through movement.
The ultimate gift of conscious life is a sense of the mystery that encompasses it.
There is no birth of consciousness without pain.
Without consciousness and intelligence, the universe would lack meaning.
Consciousness is either inexplicable illusion, or else revelation.
Without consciousness the mind-body problem would be much less interesting. With consciousness it seems hopeless.
The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom.
The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
Consciousness is not in the body; the body is in consciousness. And you are that consciousness.
Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
Meditation is realizing and expanding your inner beauty in every direction.
What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
Never give a conscious meaning to your unconscious acts!
Consciousness is what makes the mind-body problem really intractable.
Consciousness is an end in itself. We torture ourselves getting somewhere, and when we get there it is nowhere, for there is nowhere to get to.
Mind is consciousness which has put on limitations. You are originally unlimited and perfect. Later you take on limitations and become the mind.
There is no life without consciousness; there is no consciousness without life.
It is the inner life that is to spark the change in consciousness that will permit us to advance.
My experience is what I agree to attend to.
Life before consciousness was like blank paper, so be it.
He who experiences the unity of life sees his own self in all beings, and all being in his own self, and looks on everything with an impartial eye.
Changing mass consciousness is an individual responsibility.
Consciousness is the perception of what passes in man's own mind.
Without thoughts the mind cannot exist only consciousness.
The consciousness of knowing how to make oneself useful, how to help mankind in many ways, fills the soul with noble confidence, almost religious dignity.
Consciousness will not always solve the problem, but it may make the suffering meaningful.
Waking consciousness is dreaming, but dreaming constrained by external reality.
Control of consciousness determines the quality of life.
Consciousness is the creative element in the universe. Without it, nothing would appear.
Conflict is the beginning of consciousness.
The great mystery of our consciousness is beyond our grasp.
Consciousness is much more than the thorn, it is the dagger in the flesh.
The intellect has little to do on the road to discovery. There comes a leap in consciousness, call it intuition or what you will, the solution comes to you and you don't know how or why.
The bite of conscience is indecent.
The human consciousness is really homogeneous. There is no complete forgetting, even in death.
You get there by realizing you are already there.
It's from our sufferings that we form our consciousness.
To be conscious of being, you need to reclaim consciousness from the mind. This is one of the most essential tasks on your spiritual journey.
Consciousness is the glory of creation.
